product_name: NEMO Harmony 40 Sleeping Bag - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: We don't all sleep like mummies! This mild-weather bag makes room for your elbows and knees, offering a shape that gives you the performance you want on the trail and the comfort you want in camp.
short_description: We don't all sleep like mummies! This mild-weather bag makes room for your elbows and knees, offering a shape that gives you the performance you want on the trail and the comfort you want in camp.
